31110.name: Wallace & Gromit’s Grand Adventures, Episode 2: The Last Resort
31110.description:
Will the perfect holiday turn into the perfect crime?
When unrelenting rain ruins their holiday plans, Wallace & Gromit bring the beach to their basement and transform 62 West Wallaby into a makeshift resort. Keeping the customers satisfied is tricky business, especially when one of them is clocked on the head by an unknown assailant. Whodunnit? It's up to Gromit to find out... with a little help from Wallace's latest invention, the Deduct-o-matic!


Enter the colorful world of West Wallaby Street in a series of four comedy games brought to you by Aardman Animations, the creators of the Wallace & Gromit animated films, and Telltale, the award-winning studio behind Sam & Max and Strong Bad's Cool Game for Attractive People.
Key features:
  • Interact with a charismatic cast of friends and foes
  • Embark on ambitious ventures with unexpected complications
  • Make (and break) a bevy of creative contraptions
  • Marvel at a beautifully rendered world
  • Play a brand new Wallace & Gromit episode each month (four in all)
31110.supported_languages: 英语 (full audio), 法语 (Subtitles), 德语  (Subtitles), 意大利语  (Subtitles), 西班牙语 - 西班牙  (Subtitles)
